example_sentence_english: I want to import these products.
Do you still import these files?

notes: also used as formal 'Lei'; also impersonal 'it matters'

example_sentence_english: I was often importing rare books.
You were importing goods from France.

translation_english: he was importing/she was importing/you (formal) were importing/it mattered
example_sentence_english: I did not care about the result.
We were importing more last year.
They were importing a lot before the crisis.

notes: used with auxiliary avere; past participle 'importato'; also with essere when meaning 'to matter' (impersonal)
used with auxiliary avere; past participle 'importato'; also with essere when meaning 'to matter' (impersonal)
example_sentence_english: Have you imported the right file?

translation_english: he has imported/she has imported/you (formal) have imported
